Class RunningTripQueriesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.croudtrip.trips.RunningTripQueriesManager

  • public class RunningTripQueriesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles RunningTripQuerys.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkAndUpdateRunningQueries(TripOffer offer)
      Checks if the passed in offer is a match for one of the running background searches and alerts the passenger if that is the case.

      • getRunningQueries

        public java.util.List<RunningTripQuery> getRunningQueries(User passenger,
                                                 boolean showOnlyRunning)
        Find all the queries by a certain passenger.
        Parameters:
        passenger - The passenger you want to get the queries for
        showOnlyRunning - true, if you want to get only the running queries, false otherwise
        Returns:
        A list of RunningTripQuery by this passenger.

      • getRunningQuery

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<RunningTripQuery> getRunningQuery(long queryId)
        Find a running query by its id.
        Parameters:
        queryId - the id of the query you want to get.
        Returns:
        An Optional that contains the RunningTripQuery if it exists in the database.

      • deleteRunningQuery

        public void deleteRunningQuery(RunningTripQuery runningTripQuery)
        Delete a running query from the database
        Parameters:
        runningTripQuery - the query that should be deleted.

      • checkAndUpdateRunningQueries

        public void checkAndUpdateRunningQueries(TripOffer offer)
        Checks if the passed in offer is a match for one of the running background searches and alerts the passenger if that is the case.
